original_title: How to Be a Woman - Classic Educational Shorts, Vol. 2
overview: Instructions for proper female behavior from classroom films of the 1940s - '80s.  Gender may be genetic, but this series of vintage, classroom-ready shorts demonstrates that people thought a little help may be needed for some girls to become women. Modern-day viewers may gape at the emphasis on cooking in "Youâ€™re the Judge" or the oblique sex ed in "Growing Girls," but this collection is now more about entertainment than education.
title: How to Be a Woman - Classic Educational Shorts, Vol. 2
